topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54010aaa63687261ddb80000#post_54010aaa63687261ddb80000
[bq="twistedmetalero"]im really bored.

im gonna finally check touhou.

and then finish listening to those albums.[/bq]
I would suggest Embodiment of Scarlet Devil(touhou 6).  Probably the best game in the franchise would be Subterranean Animism, but it's not exactly. . err friendly to new comers; touhou 6 on the other hand is.

I would suggest adding in the visible hitbox mod; it's easy to apply the mod actually.
Mods can be found here:
http://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Game_Tools_and_Modifications
Scroll down until you see "Embodiment of Scarlet Devil"

topics.body:
In other news, "Hello Kitty isn't a cat.":http://popwatch.ew.com/2014/08/27/hello-kitty-is-not-a-cat/

Another article explained that Hello Kitty is just the personification of a cat. You know what that means? Thousands of children worldwide have unknowingly become furries. It's a conspiracy, I tell you.

"And in case you're not convinced by one article.":https://www.google.com/#q=hello+kitty+isn't+a+cat

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54010f0663687265678c0000#post_54010f0663687265678c0000
There is a english downloadable version being worked on; we're unsure if it's coming to steam.  Zun, the creator, said he wants it on steam but that it's a lot of work to so and it would take time.  In all probability it may very well come to steam.
